resources.string:
(Eng)Welcome to the "Easy Quizy" app! We are delighted to have you on board with our engaging and educational game. Here is some information about us:
We are a team of enthusiasts who have created "Easy Quizy" with the aim of providing you an enjoyable and interactive quiz experience. Our goal is to make learning and entertainment accessible and convenient for everyone.
The author and developer behind this app is Humoyun Mavlonov. I am a passionate programmer who loves creating interactive applications that help people expand their knowledge and skills. With "Easy Quizy," I wanted to offer you an opportunity to test your knowledge and develop new skills through an engaging gameplay experience.
"Easy Quizy" is developed with the support of the Global IT Academy (GITA), a leading educational center for programming and application development. GITA aims to provide quality education and help students and professionals succeed in the field of IT and programming.
We hope that "Easy Quizy" becomes your favorite way to test your knowledge, spend quality time, and have fun. Enjoy using it!
If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us. We are always here to assist you and enhance your experience with "Easy Quizy."
Best regards, Humoyun Mavlonov (tg : @hmavlonov) Team IT : GITA
